plot: During the Communist Revolution in China, a young Indian physician aids the resistance movement and develops a serum for a warfare germ, then meets and courts a Chinese girl.
title: Nightmare in Red China
plot_es: During the Communist Revolution in China, a young Indian physician aids the resistance movement and develops a serum for a warfare germ, then meets and courts a Chinese girl.
plot_en: During the Communist Revolution in China, a young Indian physician aids the resistance movement and develops a serum for a warfare germ, then meets and courts a Chinese girl.
